moves.1. e4:
So this is a very quick and nice mat
to a good player (1757 ELO)
whith not stupid mistake
and whith my dear black reversed grob !
moves.1... g5 2. g4 Bg7: beginig reversed grob, the pawns in g4 desnt seems to be a very good move ...
moves.3. Nf3 b6: i just forgot the devil kniht, this was a big mistake...but i won instead of it !
moves.4. Nxg5 Bb7:
double fianchetto ...
at this time, the game is a fine mess, for black and for white, 
but this is the way of playing grob, never easy, always risky !
moves.5... h6 6. Nf3: i could take it now, but i prefer wait a little
moves.10. Re1 Nf6 11. Nbd2 Bxf3+ 12. Bxf3 c6 1:
LOOK AT THIS !!!
do you see what i see ?
my bishop is just wait for this wonderfull rook in a1 !
the question where do i put the knight ?
i can take g4, 
or may be just put it in e4...and then in f2
what about d5 ? whould you did it ?
I did, you know why ?
moves.14... Nc3#:
YES YES YES 
that's a good old mat !
On 6 games, i won 2 and loose 4,... sure, i'm not a 1757 ELEO, but i'm very proud whith this one.
People says that grob is dangerous, yes, but for both black and white !

gameName: a nice mat whith black grob against good player
